name: Monad (mainnet arc)
Colosseum
fullText:
The @Solana Cypherpunk Hackathon has concluded. Thanks to all builders who entered products!

We're organizing the submissions & preparing to initiate the judging process, which will take 5/6 weeks.

We will announce the total # of submissions & share a public directory soon. https://t.co/io2pPiW7RP
